title: Bobble The CLOWN!!! (SCP 993 ART)
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]


 
[[image https://lounge.hexick.com/uploads/a90dce6df47bcbb6/image.png]]

[IMAGE ID: A cartoonish drawing of [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-993 SCP-993], Bobble the Clown. His hair is split dyed, half red, half green, and he holds a large knife in his hand, which is stained with blood. He wears a dark blue jumpsuit with a frilled collar and yellow stars patterning the sleeves and chest. His lips are lined with black and pink makeup, and large orange circles paint his cheeks. Behind him, it reads "BOBBLE THE CLOWN" in white block letters.]
author: Dr Vikki Lost
